title: Ambient Video Game Music - Meadows 2
description: Step further into the heart of the English countryside with this sequel to our beloved collection of 10 ambience tracks.
longDescription:
Step further into the heart of the English countryside with this sequel to our beloved collection of 10 ambience tracks, capturing even more vividly the soothing tranquillity of idyllic meadows. Specially curated for game developers, this set of tracks builds upon the first, infusing more diversity of birdsong, intricate animal noises, and varying intensities of soft rain to deliver a more immersive and enriching auditory experience to your players.


Each track in this sequel offers a deeper exploration of the rural soundscape. The chorus of birdsong is more varied and dynamic, representing a wide array of species that fill English meadows. The intricate sounds of nature's small and large inhabitants provide a richer depth to the gaming environment, creating an even more convincing portrayal of the rural idyll.


The inclusion of rain showers is more nuanced in this collection. The soft patter of rain, its rhythm changing subtly with the ebb and flow of showers, deepens the sensory richness, portraying the unpredictable, yet calming weather patterns typical of the English countryside.


This sequel is an essential addition for game developers aiming to create ever more realistic and immersive rural environments. The enhanced bird and animal sounds, the detailed representation of gentle rain showers, and the harmonious soundtrack, provide an even more comprehensive sensory exploration of an English meadow. Players' experiences within these environments are further enriched, transforming every quest or exploration into a captivating journey through nature's tranquil beauty.


This pack contains 10 tracks that are each 3 minutes long for a total 30 minutes of audio


--

Do you want to add an extra layer of immersion to your games?


Then check out our ambient video game music collections! These soundtracks will help transport you to different worlds, alien planets, frozen tundra's, Japan & hundreds of other scenarios and locations, adding an extra level of realism and excitement to your gameplay. Whether you are a game developer looking for high-quality sounds to use in your new games or breath life into some existing projects, our music collections are perfect for you!


--


We also have a number of other music collections and bundles available for sale at our publisher page, click here to check out our catalogue.
